duties_responsibilities.duty: Plan, organize, and direct site construction projects in coordination with the Superintendent.
Establish project objectives, policies, procedures, and performance standards within boundaries of company policy and contract specifications.
Confer with Superintendent to discuss work procedures, complaints, and construction problems.
Monitor and control project through administrative direction of on-site Superintendents to ensure the project is completed on schedule and within budget.
Investigate potentially serious situations and implement corrective measures.
Represent the company in project meetings, attend strategy meetings, and liaise with owners and other contacts to facilitate project activities.
Manage financial aspects of contracts to protect the company’s interest and maintain a good relationship with the customer.
Develop Scopes of Work to be used for contracts and perform bid analysis of subcontractor proposals.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Civil Engineering, Construction Management, or related field (Master's preferred)
